As I mentioned at the beginning of this article, the Beyoncé will be performing at the Nippon Budokan for the second time on May 15.
Beyons Concert Tour NeoBio at Budokan will be held on May 15. Yes, and Juice-Juice will be performing at the Nippon Budokan on May 29.
What kind of place is the Nippon Budokan?
This is my second time to perform at the Nippon Budokan, but last year was my first time. I was really surprised at the size of the building, and even when I saw it, I felt it was huge.
Nervous? Always.
Yes, I do.
I get nervous. You seem to have an image of being imposing.
Really? I'm really nervous, and I'm good at making a face that isn't nervous.
You are so good at it! Then I think you are very good at it.

Well, for me, the Nippon Budokan is not just the size of the hall, but also the feeling of looking up and seeing everyone looking at you, and the sense of applause falling on you, which I think is an atmosphere unique to the Nippon Budokan.
The first time you performed at the Budokan was also memorable, but how do you feel about the second time?

I learned a lot more from the first time than the second time, so I can use what I learned the first time to improve my performance, such as how to use my body, or how to use my muscles in a way that makes them more fearful,
You understood it the first time? You have a lot of leeway.
